title: The Warriors
quote: Waaaaariors, come out to plaaaay

title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
quote: Why was it so harshly treated by critics? I can't understand it. I like it a lot and laughed my ass off. It's just so much fun, and Pesci and Stern are brilliant as the bungling burglars. It should be reevaluated by critics.

title: Mean Streets
quote:
Scorsese's first proper film. Probably one of the influential films of all time. 
De Niro's performance as Johnny Boy is something to witness. His most energetic role and electric role.

title: The Full Monty
quote: An entertaining with a great fun central performance by Robbie Carlyle. A really uplifting film about some very bleak situations.

title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
quote: Surprisingly holds up really well. It's funny, it's sweet and really well acted. It's also a social commentary and deals with issues you wouldn't expect in a teen sex comedy.

title: Black Dynamite
quote: Genuinely hilarious. I really can't think of a better spoof of the blaxploitation era.

title: Everything Is Illuminated
quote: Quirky and inventive with great performances. Your man from Gogol Bordello was brilliant. Also it's very effecting.

title: State of Grace
quote:
GARY OLDMAN! GARY OLDMAN! GARY OLDMAN! Do I need do say anymore. 
Well other than his amazing performance (as usual) there's not much else to it. The story is the usual gangster fodder and the other cast are fine. But just watch it for Oldman, he's unbelievable in it.

title: Top Secret!
quote: I know a Little German. He's sitting over there

title: Bobby Fischer: Genius and Madman
quote: A fascinating and engrossing documentary. Really compelling and insightful. What an amazing story and interesting character. Me thinks biopic should be on the cards.

title: Napoleon Dynamite
quote: It's good but I don't fully get why people worship it. Some hilarious moments.

title: We Need to Talk About Kevin
quote: Very disturbing. The best advertisement for contraception ever. Swinton should have the Oscar.

title: Midnight in Paris
quote: return to form

title: Beowulf
quote: Yeah it looks like a overlong video game scene, and Ray Winstone six pack? But hell i really enjoyed it. Best adaptation yet. It's a great story.

title: Runaway Jury
quote: Surprisingly good fun. Excellent entertainment.
